text: Abraxas is the second studio album by Santana, a Latin rock band. It started being sold on September 23, 1970. It was the band's first album to be number one on the Billboard 200, a music chart in the United States. The album was put into the Library of Congress in 2015. == Track listing == == References == Category:1970 albums Category:Santana (band) albums
title: Abraxas (album)
